speaker: Mandy Michael
title: Functional HTML
description:
HTML, the foundation of the web! With so much time being spent on typed javascript, functional programming, unit tests, visual regression testing, tools, frameworks and a drive to write better more efficient code we often forget that the web starts with HTML.

Let’s talk HTML and semantics and why choosing the right HTML elements will help you write more accessible, efficient and maintainable code not just in your HTML but your CSS and Javascript as well. 

Most importantly we’ll explore why HTML is so vital in improving your projects overall functionality for people and for bots.
